remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派定義為事件類別。The delegate is defined for the event of the class. 您可以存取事件類別藉由指定名為的副程式**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** ASP.NET 應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中。You can access the event of the class by specifying a subroutine named **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** in the Global.asax file for your ASP.NET application. 期間引發事件事件。The event is raised during the event. 建構物件使用目前並將其傳遞給**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 您可以使用屬性物件提供給**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前給自訂物件。You can use the property of the object supplied to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果您未指定的值屬性期間**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件、 表單驗證票證之 cookie 或 URL 中所提供的識別使用。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件，才引發的時機驗證設和是應用程式使用中的 HTTP 模組。The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件設定屬性的目前至搭配自訂物件。The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom .
